mapper.sql:
FROM item a JOIN member b on a.member_mmSeq = b.mmSeq JOIN itemOption c on a.itemSeq = c.item_itemSeq WHERE 1=1 AND itDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND itTitle LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.itTitle ,b.mmNickname ,c.itemPrice
ORDER BY a.itemSeq DESC
SELECT a.* FROM item a WHERE 1=1 AND itemSeq = #{itemSeq}
